mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO prod_cov_tab
cov_code,
cov_code_disp,
cov_name,
cov_name_oth,
eff_date,
exp_date,
launch_date,
product_line,
version,
plan_ind,
med_ind,
prem_ind,
sum_ind,
occup_class_ind,
class_ind,
band_ind,
level_prem,
renew_term,
comm_polfee,

load_ind,
div_ind,
pua_ind,
rpu_ind,
anu_ind,
csv_ind,
cou_ind,
db_ind,
sb_ind,
wp_type,
partial_wp,
tm_prod_ind,
mortgage_ind,
mort_int,
unit_link,
deduct_fund_value,
split_acc,
deduct_portion,
sta_age_male,
end_age_male,
prem_mata_male,
prem_matt_male,
pol_mata_male,
pol_matt_male,
sta_age_female,
end_age_female,
prem_mata_female,
prem_matt_female,
pol_mata_female,
pol_matt_female,
yrs_in_hk,
mult_ins,
mult_cov,
keyman_excl_ind,
default_value,
order_seq,
scr_order_seq,
seq,
ref_cnt,
status,
create_date,
create_by,
upd_date,
upd_by,
appr_date,
appr_by,
form_type,
payor_ind,
whole_life_ind,
mortgage_type,
sta_age_day_female,
sta_age_day_male,
cr_rpt_code,
add_rider_ind,
prem_mat_as_bas,
pol_mat_as_bas,
comm_yr_rule,
nf_prod_line,
unit_valuation,
annuity_conv_ind,
fund_chrg_incl_comm,
edu_type,
has_eti,
bon_ind,
coupon_rate_type,
death_benefit_type,
death_benefit_rate_type,
has_maturity_payout,
has_gio,
has_rop,
lump_sum_opt,
prem_rebate_opt,
term_div_ind,

acc_term,
extra_rop_rate,

mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM prod_cov_tab as_prod_cov_tab where 1=1 and upper(as_prod_cov_tab.product_line) = upper(#{productLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and #{age,jdbcType=NUMERIC} between as_prod_cov_tab.sta_age_female and as_prod_cov_tab.end_age_female
and #{age,jdbcType=NUMERIC} between as_prod_cov_tab.sta_age_male and as_prod_cov_tab.end_age_male
order by as_prod_cov_tab.cov_code, as_prod_cov_tab.cov_code_disp

select
FROM prod_cov_tab as_prod_cov_tab where 1=1
and exists (select * from prod_cov_rid r1 where r1.cov_code= #{covCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and r1.rid_code=as_prod_cov_tab.cov_code)
and cov_code = #{productLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by as_prod_cov_tab.class_ind,as_prod_cov_tab.wp_type,as_prod_cov_tab.order_seq
mapper.sql: as_prod_cov_tab.cov_code as as_prod_cov_tab_cov_code, as_prod_cov_tab.cov_code_disp as as_prod_cov_tab_cov_code_disp, as_prod_cov_tab.cov_name as as_prod_cov_tab_cov_name,
